name: Infinitum (itch) (tosk3)
description:
The world is ravaged by temporal storms and only the time crystals can keep it stable. Collect crystals and keep your base alive.

Move from tile to tile searching for crystals. The tiles are unstable and can disappear at any time.

Control with mouse. Left click drag moves around and middle mouse click for rotation. 

You character is the upside down tree above tiles. You can only travel one tile at a time !

Its a bit basic, but im proud. Any feedback is welcome !
